T02D1381:267a-1: shra'i k'a la tsakra dda ka stu ti n'a ma /
T02D1381:267a-3: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bstod pa rgyun chags pa
T02D1381:267a-4: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal dus kyi 'khor
T02D1381:267a-6: gang zhig mtha' yas sangs rgyas chos mnga' zhing //
T02D1381:267a-7: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku yi sprul pa yis //
T02D1381:267a-8: 'phrul byed sku rnams rang bzhin mtshan nyid sku //
T02D1381:267a-9: gcig pu bde ba chen po rgyal gyur cig / gang zhig rab zab thams cad mkhyen pa'i yang //
T02D1381:267a-10: rtsis las 'das shing yan lag dang bral pa //
T02D1381:267a-11: de nyid lus can gyur na blun pos kyang //
T02D1381:267a-12: dpyad par bya ba'i spyod yul dag tu gyur //
T02D1381:267a-13: aanda rnyil dang la dang autpala sngo po dri med
T02D1381:267a-14: mkha' 'dra char sprin phreng ba bzar ma'i me tog
T02D1381:267a-15: mdog mtshungs 'od zer dra ba rab 'bar nam mkha'
T02D1381:267a-16: 'gengs mdzad mthon mthing rin chen ri 'dra'i mthar 'khrungs
T02D1381:267a-17: byu ru'i ri mchog rin chen rtse 'dra gzhon mdo
T02D1381:267a-18: gzhal ni zhabs dang sor mos rnam par bkra zhing
T02D1381:267a-19: yan lag mdzes gyur dgra dang bdud sde'i gdong la
T02D1381:267a-20: dris bsgos rab 'jigs 'byer byed phyag rgya 'dzin mdzad
T02D1381:267a-21: 'jigs rung dus mthar chem chem sgra sgrogs chu gter
T02D1381:267a-22: chad 'dra nyi ma stong lhag 'od zer dang ldan
T02D1381:267a-23: sna tshogs yum gyi glog 'gyur dang 'brel bsam gtan
T02D1381:267a-24: sgeg ldan zhi ba rab khros gsum gsum spyan 'phro
T02D1381:267a-25: rig byed zhal gyi chu skyes zhal grvar rab shar
T02D1381:267a-26: 'char ka zla ba'i dum 'dra ches gsal mche ba'i
T02D1381:267b-0: myu @267b gu dang ldan rtsa ba'i zhal sngo g-yas
T02D1381:267b-1: gdong dmar zhing bzhin rgyab ser la zla 'dra dkar
T02D1381:267b-2: pos g-yon zhal rab brgyan dri med mthing ga dkar
T02D1381:267b-3: dmar mgrin pa gsum ldan rtsib logs gnyis la de
T02D1381:267b-4: bzhin phrag 'brel thal gong so sor legs 'brel dpung
T02D1381:267b-5: pa gnyis kyis rab brgyan de nyid re rer lag
T02D1381:267b-6: gnyis nyer skyes lag pa rnams kyis rdo rje dril
T02D1381:267b-7: bu ral gri phub zlum gsal shing khatv'am gri gug
T02D1381:267b-8: thod pa mda' dang gzhu 'dzin lcags kyu zhags pa
T02D1381:267b-9: rin chen rab 'bar padma dgra stva me long lag
T02D1381:267b-10: pa 'jigs rung tshangs mgo 'khor lo ches gsal mdud
T02D1381:267b-11: dang mdung lag dbyug to tho ba lu gu rgyud
T02D1381:267b-12: 'chang cang te'u dkrol sgras bgegs kyi tshogs skrod du
T02D1381:267b-13: pa'i mdog 'dra ral pa rab brtsegs zla dum gyis
T02D1381:267b-14: brgyan cod pan rtser bzhugs 'dren pa dag dang de
T02D1381:267b-15: bzhin 'od zer lnga 'bar mgo lnga'i phreng ba sna
T02D1381:267b-16: tshos rdo rje nor bu dang ni rdo rje'i cod
T02D1381:267b-17: pan rab 'chang thub pa ma lus rtog bral dpag
T02D1381:267b-18: bsam ljon pa nyi shu bzhi phyag yal ga rab
T02D1381:267b-19: ldan sna tshogs padma zla nyi mun pa dus me'i
T02D1381:267b-20: steng na drag po dkar la lus med dmar ba'i
T02D1381:267b-21: lus la ri sras dga' ma dag gis du zhing
T02D1381:267b-22: 'jus pa'i dkar dmar mdog can g-yas brkyang stabs la
T02D1381:267b-23: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' rab dpyangs thal ba
T02D1381:267b-24: dang ni dag byed la sogs phyag rgya 'dzin mdzad
T02D1381:267b-25: khrag gi rgyun 'dzag mgo phreng ngo shal phyag dang
T02D1381:267b-26: zhabs sor lnga lnga'i mdog can de nang tshigs gsum
T02D1381:267b-27: dmar nag zla 'od 'og pag mgul rgyan snyan chas
T02D1381:267b-28: brgyan cing rkang pa sa 'dzin khur gyis rab mnan
T02D1381:267b-29: 'byung po'i dbang phyug dregs can dregs pa'i ri bo
T02D1381:267b-30: rab 'joms sil sil sgra sgrogs rkang gdub dang ldan
T02D1381:267b-31: sna tshogs yum gyi nu gnyis bum par rab gang
T02D1381:267b-32: dga' bde bdud rtsis dbang bskur bsil bar gyur pas
T02D1381:267b-33: lus kyi sa skyes pa spu rab rgyas dregs bcas
T02D1381:267b-34: rdo rje yan lag 'khyud cing skye ba kun 'joms
T02D1381:267b-35: 'dod chags med 'bar nyes pa'i bud shing ma lus
T02D1381:267b-36: bsregs pa'i thal bas rab mchod 'dod chags me las
T02D1381:267b-37: cung zad 'thigs pa'i phreng gyur zla ba rdo rje
T02D1381:267b-38: rdul thigs zil bsten dgyes pa'i rol pas rab gnas
T02D1381:267b-39: dga' ma'i yan lag gnyis kyis bsdams shing mgrin nas
T02D1381:267b-40: legs brjid brtul zhugs 'dzin mdzad dga' mas mgul 'khyud
T02D1381:267b-41: lag gnyis zhags pas 'ching bzhin ma lus rnam par
T02D1381:268a-1: / rtsol bral gnas med me chu snying ldan lhun
T02D1381:268a-2: po sna tshogs chu skyes zla ba nyi ma dgra
T02D1381:268a-3: gcan dus me las gyur sa steng sa 'og bde
T02D1381:268a-4: 'gro'i rang bzhin rdo rje gsum brtsegs rin chen gzhal
T02D1381:268a-5: med 'od 'phro nyams dgar lha mo glu len dkrol
T02D1381:268a-6: mchod sogs phul sil stan gsung ldan dri dang phreng
T02D1381:268a-7: ba mar me dang ni bdud rtsi zhes bgyis rang
T02D1381:268a-8: rang ming mthun mchod pa'i khyad par du mas rab
T02D1381:268a-9: mchod sgo rnams so sor rta babs ches mtho mdzes
T02D1381:268a-10: pa'i rgyan gyi rta babs las dpyangs dri la sgra
T02D1381:268a-11: dag dang rma ba dang sogs ca cor bzhad cing
T02D1381:268a-12: gos dang rgyal mtshan g-yer ka rab dpyangs sgeg mo
T02D1381:268a-13: bzhad ldan thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus na rab gnas
T02D1381:268a-14: ye shes 'khor lor sna tshogs yum dang ldan cig
T02D1381:268a-15: padma'i lo ma la gnas shes rab brgyad bskor de
T02D1381:268a-16: yi zur bzhir gand'i dung dang yid bzhin nor bu
T02D1381:268a-17: sa skyes gtso dang bde chen 'khor lor de bzhin
T02D1381:268a-18: don yod rin chen dbang phyug chu skyes rtags can
T02D1381:268a-19: rnam snang mdzad rnams chu skyes dkar po nyi mar
T02D1381:268a-20: rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas ji bzhin phyogs kyi
T02D1381:268a-21: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rang gi yum dang snyoms 'jug
T02D1381:268a-22: rang bzhin de ltar spyan dang bdag ma gos dkar
T02D1381:268a-23: sgrol ma rnams kyis chu skyes dmar dang zla ba'i
T02D1381:268a-24: gdan la phyogs bral gnas dang lha dang lha mo'i
T02D1381:268a-25: dbus mar ka ba'i bar du bdud rtsis rab gang
T02D1381:268a-26: bum pa rnams dang thugs kyi 'khor gnas byang chub
T02D1381:268a-27: sems chen kun tu bzang po sgrib pa rnam sel
T02D1381:268a-28: 'jig rten dbang phyug nam mkha'i snying po dang nyis
T02D1381:268a-29: dbang rdo rje dbang phyug rnams dang de bzhin g-yas
T02D1381:268a-30: brkyang zhabs kyis rab gnas padma mthar byed bgegs mthar
T02D1381:268a-31: byed dang rmugs byed dang ni rengs byed rang gi
T02D1381:268a-32: khro mo rdo rje yan lag snyoms 'jug sgo skyong
T02D1381:268a-33: rnams dang gsung gi 'khor lor rab song 'jigs ma
T02D1381:268a-34: la sogs drug cu rtsa bzhi rnal 'byor ma dbus
T02D1381:268a-35: rab gnas ts'a rtsi k'a dang 'jug ma phag mo
T02D1381:268b-0: gdong drug @268b de [*rdo?] rje lag ma ri dags
T02D1381:268b-1: dbang po'i gdan dang dang mo la gnas drag mo
T02D1381:268b-2: rnams dang sku yi 'khor lor rab zhugs rang rang
T02D1381:268b-3: padma la gnas rnal 'byor ma tshogs dbus na rab
T02D1381:268b-4: 'khod tshangs pa dbang phyug sred med bu dang me
T02D1381:268b-5: lha gshin rje gzhon nu brgya byin lhan cig gnod
T02D1381:268b-6: sbyin srin po chu dang rlung lha bgegs kyi bdag
T02D1381:268b-7: po rnams dang shing rta'i steng du mi g-yo gtsug
T02D1381:268b-8: tor dbyug sngon can dang gnod mdzes la sogs lu
T02D1381:268b-9: gu rgyud sogs lha mo'i tshogs 'khyud rta babs gnas
T02D1381:268b-10: dang sa yi dkyil steng byang chub shing sogs zla
T02D1381:268b-11: ba nyi ma de bzhin 'dod dang so sor 'dod
T02D1381:268b-12: sogs lha mo rnams kyis thams cad kun mkhyen thub
T02D1381:268b-13: pa'i dbang phyug ston pa bla ma sh'akya seng ge
T02D1381:268b-14: skyabs kyi mchog gyur ye shes che mang 'dus kyi
T02D1381:268b-15: 'khor lo lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal mchod bstod
T02D1381:268b-16: dga' bas bstod cing la la dag tu rdo rje
T02D1381:268b-17: shugs can khrag gi rgyun 'dzag glang chen pags pa'i
T02D1381:268b-18: na bzas lhag ma'i lag pa gnyis brel khro bo'i
T02D1381:268b-19: rgyal po drag shul klu bcus lus po rab brgyan
T02D1381:268b-20: 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs khro tshogs rnams kyis bgegs kyi
T02D1381:268b-21: tshogs la 'bar ba'i phur bus rtag tu rab bsnun
T02D1381:268b-22: gtum mo 'bar ba ltas mthong gyur pa rnams kyis
T02D1381:268b-23: rgyu skar tshogs 'dus glog rab 'khyug cing skar mda'
T02D1381:268b-24: ltung bar 'khrul pas rnams 'dzin zab mo 'brug sgra
T02D1381:268b-25: h'um zhes sgrog byed grub pa'i bla ma goo ta
T02D1381:268b-26: ma la yan lag bdun bshams mchod pa rnams kyis
T02D1381:268b-27: rtag tu bdag ni mchod par bgyi'o /
T02D1381:268b-29: // / mi sdug pa yi ro yi lus kyi sha
T02D1381:268b-30: dang khrag chags rab myos khyod dang ce sbyang g-yul
T02D1381:268b-31: 'gyed so yi phreng ba gtum pa'i khar byug drag
T02D1381:268b-32: shul sgras 'bros bya rog du ma'i phreng bas rab
T02D1381:268b-33: bkang phyogs char mun gtibs kun tu 'khrugs gyur rigs
T02D1381:268b-34: ldan chung ma lag gnyis zhags pas mgrin pa ring
T02D1381:268b-35: bkug kha yis chang 'thungs myos gyur mig can thod
T02D1381:268b-36: thogs du mas dpa' dang sgeg bcas sna tshogs dang
T02D1381:268b-37: ldan aa mra la sogs shing gi tshogs dpyangs chom
T02D1381:268b-38: rkun lus la khrag la brkam pa'i rgod sogs rnams
T02D1381:268b-39: kyis sder mos bab bsnun zag pa'i khrag gi rgyun
T02D1381:268b-40: gyis mun gnyi bas mun pa'i khrod na khrag rgyun
T02D1381:268b-41: 'thungs pa'i yi dags kha rlangs me tshogs rab 'khrug
T02D1381:268b-42: ts'u ta ki li byang chub shing sogs dur khrod
T02D1381:269a-0: sdong bu'i ser kar lus ring @269a * //
T02D1381:269a-1: rtse mo phyed 'thon longs spyod dbang po rlung 'thung
T02D1381:269a-2: dum dum khrigs gyur sor mo sor phreng long bu
T02D1381:269a-3: pus mo bral dang rje ngar rgal tshigs rked rus
T02D1381:269a-4: rus pa skam pos sa gzhi dag ni mche ba
T02D1381:269a-5: can gyur yal ga'i rtse dpyangs 'jigs rung mgo phreng
T02D1381:269a-6: rlung gis rab bskyed skye gnas lag pas shing drung
T02D1381:269a-7: dag na sdigs pa'i mdzub ston chem chem gra sgrogs
T02D1381:269a-8: 'khor byed dang ni gtum po la sogs sprin las
T02D1381:269a-9: byung ba'i thog sgra drag pos rab skrag 'phur ba'i
T02D1381:269a-10: 'ug pa khva dang bya rgod la sogs gshog pa'i
T02D1381:269a-11: tshogs kyis mkhal la rab bsnun phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1381:269a-12: ma lus nyon mongs dbugs sgra 'byin byed brkam zhing
T02D1381:269a-13: ma nges bya rgod g-yul tshogs phan tshun rab khros
T02D1381:269a-14: kha khva sgra 'byin sgrub pa'i tshogs brtan la lar
T02D1381:269a-15: bcad pa'i mgo dang mjing pa gsum btags rkub tshos
T02D1381:269a-16: rgyu ma'i phreng ba rna ba sna mchu sor mo'i
T02D1381:269a-17: phreng ldan rul ba'i dri bsung la la dag tu
T02D1381:269a-18: rigs ldan 'jig rten 'chi bdag rnams kyis rtag tu
T02D1381:269a-19: 'khor lo'i longs spyod don du mi rnams rtag sgrol
T02D1381:269a-20: kha cig dag tu mtshan mo'i cha la dur mes
T02D1381:269a-21: phyed sregs lhag ma'i mgul dum lus las byung ba'i
T02D1381:269a-22: zhag dang glad pa rkang dang tshil dang ro dang
T02D1381:269a-23: rgyu ma'i mar khu'i rlan gyis rab 'bar ba lta
T02D1381:269a-24: dka'i me yis la la tshig pa'i lus po dag
T02D1381:269a-25: la yan lag chur bcu gce sbyang rnams kyis chil
T02D1381:269a-26: chil me gsad nye bar longs spyod lha mo'i khyim
T02D1381:269a-27: du rnal 'byor dang ni rnal 'byor ma dbang 'khor
T02D1381:269a-28: lo gar phyir khang k'a tsa tsad pu da la
T02D1381:269a-29: sogs bya ba rab ldan sna tshogs cang te te'u
T02D1381:269a-30: la sogs rab brdungs sgra dang rdo rje glu la
T02D1381:269a-31: sogs kyi lhag ma'i bza' ba don gnyer rab 'phel
T02D1381:269a-32: gyis gtor 'dzam bu'i phreng ba thams thams so rdegs
T02D1381:269a-33: ma rungs sgra yis dang ngas par byed rgyun sha
T02D1381:269a-34: chen khrag 'thung ro langs srin po sha za dang
T02D1381:269a-35: ni smyo byed la sogs pem sgra drag po rjes
T02D1381:269a-36: sgrogs rdo rje lha mo'i sdum par sgrub po du
T02D1381:269a-37: ma'i h'um dang phat sgras rab tu rgyug byed yig
T02D1381:269a-38: dgas kha nas rkan sgra sgrogs pas 'jigs rung rab
T02D1381:269a-39: 'bar me yis cher gas ma mgo bo glad mig
T02D1381:269a-40: gsum btags rje ngar lag pa'i tshigs rnams tsam tsam
T02D1381:269a-41: pa tad rab 'dres dbyangs sgrogs rnam shes brgyad dag
T02D1381:269a-42: ngur khrod brgyad na rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo dkyil 'khor
T02D1381:269b-0: gdan la g-yas bskum gyis gnas khyi yi @269b bzhin
T02D1381:269b-1: ldan bya rog mchu can ce sbyang gdong dang mkha'
T02D1381:269b-2: lding dang ni 'ug pa phag dang bya rgod la
T02D1381:269b-3: sogs gdong can brgyad mchod 'jigs byed 'jigs byed blo
T02D1381:269b-4: 'chang bgegs kyi bgegs dang nyon mongs nad sel sman
T02D1381:269b-5: pa'i rgyal po skyes pa kun dga' tshogs stsol yid
T02D1381:269b-6: bzhin phun sum tshogs ster dus kyi 'khor lo bde
T02D1381:269b-7: chen mchog la bdag ni grol bar skyabs su mchi'o
T02D1381:269b-9: / // / rgyun chad med par 'od zer las 'khrungs sangs
T02D1381:269b-10: rgyas tshogs kyis nam mkha'i khams bkang gangg'a'i klung mang
T02D1381:269b-11: bye ma'i grangs mnyam sems can phan 'dogs lan cig
T02D1381:269b-12: nyid la 'jigs rten khams su lhun gyis grub pa'i
T02D1381:269b-13: thugs rje dag gis slob ma dang ni bse ru
T02D1381:269b-14: la sogs chos la mos gnas rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D1381:269b-15: bsam pa la ltos skyes pa la sogs mya ngan
T02D1381:269b-16: 'das par rdzogs sangs rgyas mdzad mtha' yas rab brtan
T02D1381:269b-17: gsum kun mkhyen nyid byang chub phyogs dang tshad med
T02D1381:269b-18: dang ni nyon mongs med dang ma 'dres bco brgyad
T02D1381:269b-19: bsnyel med chos nyid la sogs du ma'i chos sku'i
T02D1381:269b-20: bdud rtsis nyon mongs nyes pa ma lus legs bkrus
T02D1381:269b-21: sum cu gnyis lhag mtshan gyis rab gsal 'jig rten
T02D1381:269b-22: bla ma ye shes lus can gnyis med thugs rje
T02D1381:269b-23: rtag tu rab dgyes dpe byad brgyad cu'i rgyan gyis
T02D1381:269b-24: mdzes gyur 'jig rten gsum gyi skye bo mchog lus
T02D1381:269b-25: phun sum tshogs pa zil gyis gnon cing thog ma
T02D1381:269b-26: dang ni mtha' dbus spangs pa'i dam pa'i chos sgra
T02D1381:269b-27: rgya chen dag la nye bar longs spyod byang chub
T02D1381:269b-28: sems dpa' gcig pus rtogs bya longs spyod rdzogs su
T02D1381:269b-29: dpyad par da zhing zhi la mtshan nyed rnal 'byor
T02D1381:269b-30: chos rig spros dang bral zhing nyon mongs rnam rtog
T02D1381:269b-31: dpa' rlabs rab spangs mchog dga'i rgya mtsho chos kyi
T02D1381:269b-32: dbyings mchog tshangs pa'i dbyangs can nyi zla 'gags gyur
T02D1381:269b-33: dus kyi bdag nyid zhe sdang rnams dang gti mug
T02D1381:269b-34: kun rmongs pa rgyal rab bsnyil 'dod chags sbyong mdzad
T02D1381:269b-35: de nyid log rtog lus su lta 'joms 'khor ba'i
T02D1381:269b-36: rgyun gcod bde 'gro gnas ston ngan 'gro rab 'joms
T02D1381:269b-37: sdig pa kun skems bsod nams tshogs spel ye shes
T02D1381:269b-38: tshogs grub nyon mongs 'joms mdzad byang chub rigs 'dzin
T02D1381:269b-39: dpal mdzad sna tshogs sgyu ma bsod nams ye shes
T02D1381:269b-40: 'jig rten srung mdzad dogs pa kun sel dga' gsol
T02D1381:270a-0: dga' @270a * // mgu rab stsol sgeg dang dpa'
T02D1381:270a-1: bo mi sdug drag shul snying rje la sogs sna
T02D1381:270a-2: tshogs ro yis 'jig rten rtag srung sprul sku gar
T02D1381:270a-3: mdzad he ru ka gtso rkang 'og mi yul bde
T02D1381:270a-4: 'gro gzugs gcig gzugs bzang gzugs ngan ma lus gzugs
T02D1381:270a-5: spangs te nyid gsum ldan rdo rje gsum bdag sems
T02D1381:270a-6: gsum dbyer med rnal 'byor bzhi dag byang chub bzhi
T02D1381:270a-7: rtogs sku bzhi rab grub tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mig
T02D1381:270a-8: lnga dang ldan ye shes lnga bdag dag pa'i dbang
T02D1381:270a-9: po rdo rje ba spu steng gi tshangs bug gtsug
T02D1381:270a-10: tor 'khor lo'i nang khyab bcu drug dga' bas rab
T02D1381:270a-11: gang ye shes chen po'i khams kyis cher rdzogs bcu
T02D1381:270a-12: drug cha yis shes rab snang ba gtsug tor chen
T02D1381:270a-13: po'i 'khor lo dag tu 'gyur ba med gnas de
T02D1381:270a-14: nyid sa dang reg byed las skyes rlung dang nam
T02D1381:270a-15: mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin mgo bo mgrin pa snying
T02D1381:270a-16: ga dang ni gsang ba la gnas zla ba nyi
T02D1381:270a-17: ma dus kyi me dang mun pha la zhugs dri
T02D1381:270a-18: med skyas mchog legs smin dngul chu zhes bya'i mtshan
T02D1381:270a-19: mthar ye shes dam pa bla med tshul khrims dam
T02D1381:270a-20: pa'i chos grub khyab bdag 'jig rten ma lus mthar
T02D1381:270a-21: byed log par lta 'joms 'jig rten mun sel dus
T02D1381:270a-22: kyi 'khor lo tshangs chen khyab 'jug rdo rje can
T02D1381:270a-23: bde 'gyur rnams kyis mchod bstod bsten cing spyi bos
T02D1381:270a-24: rab gtugs 'byung po dri za gnod sbyin lto 'phye
T02D1381:270a-25: zhing skyong la sogs pa dang 'jig rten skyong bas
T02D1381:270a-26: rab bsten mgon po de la rtag tu bdag gis
T02D1381:270a-27: bla med byang chub por sems ni bskyed bgyi'o /
T02D1381:270a-29: // / de ltar bdag gis rgyun chags bstod pa bgyis pa las //
T02D1381:270a-30: bsod nams gang des dus mthar 'gro ba skye ba yi //
T02D1381:270a-31: 'khri shing 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras kyi me tog dang //
T02D1381:270a-32: byang chub ces bya'i 'bras bur 'bras dang bcas gyur
T02D1381:270a-33: cig / dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bstod pa rgyun
T02D1381:270a-35: ka li dka'i rgyal po'i bla ma sde snod gsum
T02D1381:270a-36: bshad pa'i mkhas pa chen po legs pa'i grags pas
T02D1381:270a-39: // / rgya gar ghi pandi ta bi n'a ya shr'i mi tra dang /
